keyword: how many calories in a muffin
title: How Many Calories Are in a Muffin?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a muffin, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown for a standard bakery muffin.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Muffin?
assumptions: Standard bakery muffin (e.g., blueberry or plain), medium size (~60g), baked without added toppings or frosting.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by type (e.g., bran vs. chocolate chip), brand, size, and ingredients; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical muffin contains about 350 kcal, with high carbs from flour and sugar.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a blueberry muffin?
faqs.a: About 350 kcal for a standard medium blueberry muffin.
Yes, typically 50 g carbs per muffin, mostly from flour and sugars.

faqs.q: How much protein in a muffin?
faqs.a: Around 5 g protein per standard muffin.

faqs.q: Do muffins have a lot of sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, about 20 g sugars per muffin from added sweeteners.
Type (e.g., bran lower, chocolate chip higher), size, and add-ins like nuts or chocolate.
